desc: Autotaps Limited is located in Croydon, Greater London, and we are one of UK's leading manufacturers of innovative automatic infrared sensor tap products for commercial and domestic applications. Our ultimate goal is the continuation of creating superior products, customer satisfaction, after-sales support.

layout.text: Supreme Elegance in its design and structure. These Prestige Series are designer sensor taps, with unique waterfall-effect spout that gives a classy and one-of-a-kind water delivery whilst saving water.
